name: MetronicHomeStay
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Thanks to the Home Stay Skill, you can contol your Metronic connected devices with fingers and now voice !
1.Download the Metronic Home Stay APP and create an account. You can then install your connected devices (plugs, lamps, …) and control them from anywhere around the world.
2.Once the Home Stay Skill is connected to your Home Stay account, you can control your devices with the voice assistant.

"Alexa, turn off the fan !"
"Alexa, switch on the light !"
